original_text: Then the angel said to me, ‘Write down this message: “There will be a special meal at the Lamb's wedding party. God has truly blessed those people that he has asked to come to that meal.” ’ The angel also said to me, ‘This is a true message from God.’ Then the angel said to me, ‘Write down this message: “There will be a special meal at the Lamb's wedding party. God has truly blessed those people that he has asked to come to that meal.” ’ The angel also said to me, ‘This is a true message from God.’
korean_text: 천사가 내게 말하기를 기록하라 어린 양의 혼인 잔치에 청함을 받은 자들은 복이 있도다 하고 또 내게 말하되 이것은 하나님의 참되신 말씀이라 하기로

sentences.original_text: Then the angel said to me
There will be a special meal
God has truly blessed those people
that he has asked to come to that meal.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 식사에 오라고 초대한 사람들을

sentences.original_text: The angel also said to me
This is a true message from God.
